Boards, Modules and Sub-Systems based on Z80 Family

If there are popular controller moduls or systems based on Z80 family, you know of or you would like to point to, please tell me, or - even better - contact me if you are ready to maintain any "z80cms*" sub page not yet existing, nicely fitting into my Z80 series of documents.

(Co-) Processor Boards with Z80 Family

  • Every PC needs a Z-80! An ISA plug in card system with Z80 CPU and Memory, (the PC can read/write from/into Z80 memory) by Gyro Gearloose
  • Versalogic Z80 processor boards (4 different models available)
  • Card Z180 for Apple ][ by John D. Baker
  • PCPI AppliCard for Apple ][ by John D. Baker
